wikipedia_page.main: Edward Ernest Pepper (2 November 1879 – 1960) was a British gymnast who competed in the 1912 Summer Olympics. He was born in Birmingham, West Midlands. He was part of the British team, which won the bronze medal in the gymnastics men's team, European system event in 1912.
